version_description: Welcome to dashboards with charts. We’ve renamed “Sights” as “dashboards” and made it easier than ever to tell your story. Show trends, status, numeric relationships, and more in a glance.
Thanks for using Smartsheet! We regularly update our app with improvements to help you take action on the go. We’ll highlight key new features as they become available.

We’ve added reminders in the Notification Center so you can stay aware of key dates and deliverables. This release also includes dashboards with Stacked, Smooth Line, Step Line, Donut, Half-Pie, and Area charts so that you can view your story in more styles than ever.
Barcode scanning allows you to scan barcodes as you search in a sheet or enter sheet data, enabling you to update work status more quickly and accurately.
Thanks for using Smartsheet! We regularly update our app with improvements to help you take action on the go. We’ll highlight key new features as they become available.

Whether you’re in the field or away from your desk, utilize the power of Smartsheet with a new mobile editing experience that enables you to move from idea to impact, fast:

- Toggle checkboxes, update dropdowns, change dates, and make quick edits, directly in the grid.
- Row, column, and cell toolbars make actions such as indenting content more discoverable and easier to use.
- A new sheet menu provides a central location to access actions such as sorting rows and opening forms.

For workflows that require row-by-row editing, the Edit Row experience can be found by tapping on a row number or long pressing on a cell.
Thanks for using Smartsheet! We regularly update our app with improvements to help you take action on the go. We’ll highlight key new features as they become available.

New enhancements in this release help you accomplish more on the go:

- Redesigned mobile forms with an updated look and feel.
- Scan barcodes within mobile forms.
- Assign tasks to multiple contacts.
- Manage updates to your sheet through locking columns/rows and hiding columns.

Welcome to Smartsheet Mobile Card View.

- Drag and drop cards between lanes or in the upper lane index to visualize tasks and keep your work moving.
- Configure the calculated values of card lanes to quickly evaluate your work in a new way.

To get started with Card View, make sure that your sheet has at least one dropdown, contact, or symbol column.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
New look and feel when you log in or sign up!
Bug fixes.

Accomplish more on the go with these new enhancements:
- Save your location in text/number columns in forms and sheets
- Add and edit hyperlinks
- Resize grid columns for easier reading
- Easily see which filter is applied on a sheet

Accomplish more than ever while you're on the go:

- Play YouTube and Vimeo videos directly in a dashboard
- Hear your data read aloud with VoiceOver
- View your organization’s custom welcome screen

Accomplish more than ever while you're on the go:

- Easily access comments, attachments, and more with updated toolbars
- Expand and collapse card view lanes

Notify your team and accomplish more while you're on the go:

- @Mention people in comments to notify them
- Add and edit grid data easily with more space in the edit bar
Bug fixes.

Accomplish more than ever while you're on the go:

- View column descriptions.
Create sheets in fewer steps.
